html:
{% set terms_exist = doc.terms and (doc.terms|striptags).strip() or "" %} {% if letter_head and not no_letterhead -%}
{{ letter_head }}
{%- endif %}

Date: {{ doc.offer_date }}

Dear {{ doc.applicant_name }},

We are pleased to appoint you in the services of {{ doc.company }} on the terms and conditions detailed in this letter.

Your designation shall be {{ doc.designation }}.

{%- if doc.offer_terms -%} {%- for row in doc.offer_terms -%} {{ row.offer_term }}: {{ row.value }}
{%- endfor -%} {%- endif -%}
Please read the detailed terms as below. If you have any queries, feel free to get in touch with us. We look forward to your long and fruitful career association with our organisation. If you decide to join us, 'Welcome to {{ doc.company }} !'

Yours truly,



Authorized Signatory
{{ doc.company }}

{% if terms_exist %}
{{ doc.terms }}
{% endif %}

GSTIN") }} {% endif %} {% endif %}
{% if doc.docstatus == 0 %} {{ doc.status + " "+ (doc.select_print_heading or _("Invoice")) }}

", " ") %} {{ _("Customer") }}:
{{ doc.customer_name }}
{{ customer_address }} {% endif %}

{%- for item in doc.items -%} {%- endfor -%}

{{ _("Total Excl. Tax") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("net_total", doc) }} {{ _("Total") }} {{ doc.get_formatted("total", doc) }}

Terms And Conditions :

Imp Notes (Applicable If Any): sdf

Scope Considerations along with BOM:


1. Design, Engineering, Supply, Installation & Commissioning along with Testing of Solar PV System.

2. BOM & Particulars:

a. Solar PV Module Make - Premier / Pennar / Equivalent

b. Module mounting structures - Suntek make

c. Solar Inverters - Growatt make / Equivalent.

d. DC / AC cabling (Polycab Make), DC Cable of Maximum 15 Meters per String & AC Cable of Maximum 5 Meters. Suntek will bill extra for additional Cables in separate Invoice.

f. Separate Earthing for DC, AC Systems will be provided, where as all Civil works & Earthpit digging works are in Client Scope

g. Protection Systems (Lighting Arrestors (for 5 kWp), AC & DC Distribution Box of Siemens Make

h. In Built Data Logging Equipment (client need to provide wifi(non Jio) at Inverter place at time of installation).

General Terms & Conditions


1) PRICE: Any change in scope of work or addition to the bill of materials and/or ratings or any variation, whatsoever, shall be charged extra to Customer.

2) PAYMENT TERMS: a) 80% along with purchase order
b) 20% against Invoice & DC (before material dispatch).

3) Order Cancellation Charges : a) Before feasibility release 5% of Billing amount & Application Charges (TSSPDCL).
b) After feasibility release 10% of Billing amount & Application Charges (TSSPDCL & TSREDCO).
c) After In-principle from TSREDCO 20% of Billing amount & Application Charges.

4) DELIVERY & HANDOVER: Suntek shall complete the project in 25 Days(upto 50 kWp) from date of approvals from Feasibility and In-principle sanction from TSREDCO, Feasibility report from TSSPDCL.Project shall be deemed to have been handed over to Customer by Suntek, on commissioning of the solar plant (Excluding Meter Fixing as its purely depends on Net meter availability & TSSPDCL Team responses)

5) WARRANTY: The solar power plant carries a five (5) years warranty from the date of invoice, as per existing warranty policy of Suntek Energy Systems. Solar photovoltaic modules carry a performance warranty against excess of 80% degradation in twenty five (25) years as per existing warranty policy of Suntek. * Warranty not applicable for Electrical accessories like MCB's, SPD's, etc. as these are protecting devices.

6) SECURITY & SAFETY: On delivery of supplies to site in good condition, Client shall be responsible for safety & security of the materials till handing over of the same to Suntek designated personnel for installation.

7) Remote Monitoring: Remote Monitoring Service will be provided from Suntek & It's Mandatory as per Subsidy norms, More over this will be useful to any client to track the system performance. If this is not activated in 3 workingdays from the date of system installation, Suntek will chargeextra @ 500/-+ GST. Once WIFI Configuration done client shall not change the wifi user id & password. ReConfiguration Charges are extra at Rs. 500/- + GST for each time.

Date: {{ doc.offer_date }}

Dear {{ doc.applicant_name }},

We are pleased to appoint you in the services of {{ doc.company }} on the terms and conditions detailed in this letter.

Your designation shall be {{ doc.designation }}.

Subject: Offer of Employment We are delighted to offer you employment on a full-time basis in the role of {{doc.designation}}. It is intended for you to commence your employment on {{doc.offer_date}}. Please read through the letter carefully and indicate your acceptance of the offer by signing and returning a copy of this letter. 1.Your Position You will be employed on the terms & Conditions in this agreement, in the role of Solar Technicians In addition to any duties allocated by the employer from time to time, your position will involve the duties set out below: 2.Location You will be based at Head Office, although we may direct you to work at different locations from time to time. 3.Probationary Period Your employment is subject to the satisfactory completion of the probationary period of 03 months. The probationary period is designed to grant the employer time to assess whether you are able to fulfil your role with the employer. During the probationary period, your employment may be terminated by either your own request or the employer upon providing one week’s written notice (or payment in lieu of that notice). 4.Hours of Work a.    As a full-time employee you will be required to devote to substantially the whole of your time and attention during the employer’s ordinary business hours to the performance of your duties under this agreement. b.    You will not be entitled to receive any remuneration for work performed outside of the hours referred to in sub-clause (a) above. 5.Salary & Benefits a.    Your annual salary will be Rs. {{doc.ctc}}. b.    The salary will be paid monthly into nominated deposit account. Salary will be revised after completion of probation period based on the performance. c.    The above-mentioned salary is the total cost to the company and includes all payments made and benefits provided by the employer directly or indirectly to or on your behalf, whether as salary or otherwise. 6.Leave You will be entitled to casual and sick leave in accordance with the applicable laws and the leave policy of the company. 7.Company policy You agree that the employer’s policies, as mentioned or replaced from time to time, shall be binding upon you but shall not form part of the employment contract. 8.Confidentiality and Intellectual Property a.    You agree that you will not divulge any of the confidential information or trade secrets of the employer to any person, whether during or after the termination of your employment. b.    You will be punished under section 11 (divulge any of the confidential information). 9.Termination a.    During your employment, either party may terminate this agreement by providing written notice of 3 months (or payment in lieu of notice) to the other party. b.    Notwithstanding sub-clause (a) above, the employer may terminate this agreement by notice effective immediately without payment (except salary occurred to the date of termination) where you have committed an act of willful or serious misconduct, are significantly neglectful of your duties, or you are in breach of this agreement. c.    Experience letter or relieving letter will be issued, only if the service completes one year. 10. Acceptance This letter of offer contains the proposed Terms & Conditions of your employment with the Employer and is subject to the preparation and execution of a formal contract of Employment. Send your acceptance through email. Upon investigation, any information of Employment/Educational background/Personal info, if found to be false or misleading can lead to termination of services at the company’s discretion. On your acceptance of this offer, an appointment letter with detailed terms and conditions will be given only after the completion of the mandatory probation period. This offer letter is valid only till 19.08.2024 and is subject to the receipt of above said documents/details by us before this date. We are looking forward to having you with us and wish you great success with Suntek Energy Systems Pvt. Ltd. Regards, For Suntek Energy Systems Pvt. Ltd.  Managing Director I accept and agree the proposed terms of employment and request that the Employer may prepare a formal contract of employment for execution. ______________________ Signature with date
Please read the detailed terms as below. If you have any queries, feel free to get in touch with us. We look forward to your long and fruitful career association with our organisation. If you decide to join us, 'Welcome to {{ doc.company }} !'

Yours truly,



Authorized Signatory
{{ doc.company }}

{% if terms_exist %}
{{ doc.terms }}
{% endif %}
